name: Bag Jelly

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1 damage) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)
